Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.commands

Class BukkitCommandWrapper

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.command.Command
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.commands.BukkitCommandWrapper
public class BukkitCommandWrapper extends org.bukkit.command.Command
Bukkit command wrapper for integrating custom command logic with Bukkit's command system.
